info.name: GaiAzenis
info.description:
The original Azenis-inspired theme I created after not being able to sleep.
A slick new dark interface inspired by the GTK2 Theme Azenis by JamesHardy88
Current Release [0.4a] - Mostly Fixed for Vanilla Gaia!
Please check the other screenshots!
info.additionalInfo: BetterGaia users, I only have one work around for the background issue, reload the theme.
